alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 09 at 5:37AM MST until December 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 8 and 14 inches in the mountains and Lookout Pass and 4 to 8 inches possible in the Silver Valley and around St. Maries. The heaviest snow is expected to fall between Saturday evening through early Sunday morning. * WHERE...Fernwood, Kellogg, Wallace, Fourth Of July Pass, Lookout Pass, St. Maries, Dobson Pass, Osburn, Mullan, and Pinehurst. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1.
